resources.string: SideEffects uses data from the Sider2 Side Effect Resource (sideeffects.embl.de). Side effects may occasionally be missing or incorrect. This information is not intended as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Please do not stop taking any medication without consulting your physician.
Which of your medications have this symptom as a side effect?
